title: Find Maximum
description: Given two numbers, print the maximum.
inputFormat: The first line contains a single integer N. The second line contains N space-separated integers.
explanation: The numbers are 4 and 5. The maximum is 5.

title: Sum of Two Numbers
description: Given two numbers, print their sum.
inputFormat: The first line contains two integers A and B.
outputFormat: Print the sum of A and B.
